extendedInfo.description: Scanning for consumer products will never be so easy again.  After extensive reseach we have developed the quickest scanner for easy useLaser Quick QR Barcode Scanner is extremely fast and easy to use for maximum use.This duel app is used one-dimensional and two-dimensional code. By using the phone's camera, this app will quickly scan and recognize the information of one-dimensional code and two-dimensional code like no other.app is equipped with auto focus, fast recognition and automatic decoding function. Scan barcodes on products then look up prices and reviews. Use this information to retrive URL's and Company data info. Also share your contacts, apps, and bookmarks via QR Code.In addition you will be able to encode a wealth of information including contacts, phone numbers, email, free text location and current position by simply taking them from your contacts or by entering them manually. Once you do the encoding of information choices, you can send this information via SMS, email, bluetooth, DLNA, and other services. All your scan will be saved in a history of easy access.We value your opinions and we want you to be completely happy with this very important application.Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns by emailing us directly so that we can answer each question right away. No reason to leave negative feedback as we will resolve any issues you might have.We hope you enjoy this application as much as we have making this for you.We have included a ton of additional free Christ prayer daily secrets for you to enjoy as well.Our Goal here at EHURISITIC PRODUCTS is to bring you a more social experience including but not limited to tools that allow you to: more easily invite your friends to your app, receive alerts from your friends, and receive social advertising. Use of this application is governed by the EHURISITIC PRODUCTS Terms of Service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to EHURISITIC PRODUCTS Privacy Policy. Social Networking Service terms may also apply. For more details on our privacy party and terms of use, please visit our site at any time at http://www.Ehurisitcappreviews.comYou can optout notification ads from:Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optoutSendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/every mobile landing page that the user is directed to has an "unsubscribe" link at the bottom, which opts-out a user with a single click.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I always wondered what this black and white signs actually depicts! But not anymore. Now I have my own barcode scanner.
reviews.author: Harry Mark

reviews.title: Praiseworthy!
reviews.comment: I have used so many similar apps but I have to admit that this is by far the best barcode scanner app.
reviews.author: Andrew Gibson

reviews.title: Great one
reviews.comment: This app is equipped with auto focus, fast recognition and automatic decoding function. Great help.
reviews.author: Lusaf Stanley

reviews.title: Superb app!
reviews.comment: This duel app is used both one-dimensional and two-dimensional code which is proved to be very useful. Superb app.
reviews.author: Edward Ed.

reviews.title: Fabulous App!
reviews.comment: Scanning for the consumer products was never so easy and will never be easy without this app. It is a must have app.
reviews.author: Mohit Himu

reviews.title: Must Have!
reviews.comment: This app  is extremely fast and easy to use for maximum use, I am totally satisfied with it, I couldn\'t get better than this.

reviews.title: The best QR scanner
reviews.comment: its the best app for barcode scanning in the market works perfect!

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: I like it. Works perfectly. Simple to use. I can scan everything.
